name: DuaCar
description:
DuaCar is a dual-car arcade driving game, where you have to make it through the levels with both cars at the same time. How fast can you get through each of them?

Developed by Ben Thompson for Global Game Jam 2022.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move Cars
  • R - Reset Level
  • Escape - Return to Main Menu

Asset Credits:

  • Kenney • City Kit (Roads)
  • Kenney • Car Kit
  • Kenney • UI Kit
  • Tuffy Font by Thatcher Ulrich
